nodes.text: The Prosperity-class Customs Cruiser was a light cruiser built by Elrood StarYards, Ltd.

Prosperity-class ships were primarily patrol craft, used for customs inspections, anti-pirate operations and regular planetary defense missions. Armed with six heavy turbolasers, two tractor beam projectors, and protected by deflector shielding, they were however no match against Imperial vessels of the day.

This class was especially popular within the worlds of the Elrood sector. Elrood itself was protected by two dozen Prosperities, one for each starport and the rest remained on patrol and outer orbit customs duty.
